about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Art is the language of my soul
about.bio: I am an artist who has been painting for more than 15 years, creating over 50 artworks that reflect emotions and colors of life.
about.journeyText1: My passion for art started at a young age, inspired by nature and people around me.
about.journeyText2: Every artwork I create tells a story — a story of colors, emotions, and beauty.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions
faq.q1: How can I purchase a painting?
faq.a1: Click the 'Buy Now' button on any artwork and fill out the purchase form. We’ll contact you soon to confirm your order.
faq.a2: Yes, we provide international shipping. Shipping fees depend on the destination country.
faq.q3: Can I commission a custom artwork?
faq.a3: Absolutely! You can contact me directly to discuss your idea, size, and style preferences.
faq.q4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a4: We accept online card payments, bank transfers, and local cash payments in Uzbekistan.
faq.a5: Yes, each piece is 100% original, created by Bibisora herself. Some digital artworks are available as limited edition prints.
faq.a6: Yes, visits are available by appointment. Please contact us to schedule your visit.
faq.a7: You can reach us via the contact page or by email at info@bibisora.art.
